title: Ophus retires, Haga named CEO of CCD
title_page: Ophus retires, Haga named CEO of CCD
maintext:
CCD Business Development Corporation, with offices in Roseburg and Coos Bay, announced Eileen Ophus, executive director and CEO, will retire June 30. Ophus joined CCD in 1999 in the loan department and soon became the community development director. In 2015 she assumed the executive director and CEO position.
The CCD board of directors unanimously elected Theresa Haga to become the executive director and CEO while retaining her current position as business finance manager, effective July 1. Haga has been with CCD since 2000 as a documentation specialist, loan officer and finance manager.
CCD was formed in 1971 as an economic development district for Coos, Curry and Douglas counties under the U.S. Economic Development Administration. In 1982 the organization became an SBA 504 certified development company.
